name: Chinedu Unaka
bio: Chinedu is an LA based comedian, actor and writer, best known for his stand up appearances on television, internationally and around the United States. Recently Chinedu was seen on the hit comedy series The Mindy Project (FOX/HULU) and will be featured on an upcoming season of HULU's Coming to the Stage . He also just returned from an overseas tour performing for the US Troops stationed across the Middle East, a comedy tour of India and has a short film he starred in, alongside Luke Cage's Simone Missick, that's coming to HBO in 2017. Chinedu was also a top finalist in 3 comedy festivals, headlines his own college tour and features for Damon Wayans Jr.
